SELECT a.sku as sku, substr(b.descr_e,0,70) as sku_desc, a.locationid, a.traceid, SUM(A.QTY ) as qty from inv_lot_loc_id a LEFT JOIN BAS_SKU B ON A.SKU = B.SKU and b.customerid=a.customerid LEFT JOIN INV_LOT_ATT D ON d.lotnum=a.lotnum LEFT JOIN VIEW_MULTIWAREHOUSE C ON A.LOCATIONID = C.LOCATIONID LEFT JOIN BAS_LOCATION E ON E.LOCATIONID=A.LOCATIONID WHERE
D.LOTATT08 = 'N' AND E.PICKZONE <>'KE010301' AND A.LOCATIONID NOT IN ('STAGEKE01','SORTATIONKE01') and a.LOCATIONID LIKE CONCAT( CONCAT('%KE01-01-',#{shelf}),'%') group BY a.sku,b.descr_e,a.locationid, a.traceid order by a.locationid ,a.traceid
